SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller

Class ResourceController

java.lang.Object
sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller.ResourceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/resource") public class ResourceController extends Object
Controller for managing resources in a course. This class handles uploading, updating, and retrieving resources associated with a course.

    • uploadResource

      @PostMapping(value="/uploadResource", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller.SetResponse> uploadResource(@RequestParam String courseId, @RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @RequestParam String userId, @RequestParam Long groupId)
      Uploads a resource file to the server.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course
      file - the resource file to upload
      userId - the ID of the user uploading the file
      groupId - the group ID associated with the resource
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating success or failure
